thread.title: Small cozy hotel.. perfect location
thread.title_full: Small cozy hotel.. perfect location - Review of Hotel Claridge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cesar Alexander T
title: Small cozy hotel.. perfect location
text:
Very pleasant stay. Awesome location and very nice personnel. I liked the classic style of the room, and I would like to emphasize on the convenient location .. very close to Champs Elysee, near clubs, bars etc.
Room Tip: choose floors close to the ground.. elevator is very small and going stairs up is not so convenient. See more room tips
